tags.name: cwc-icon
tags.description: Icon web component that renders svg shapes that can be customized with CSS classnames.
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * Icon web component that renders svg shapes that can be customized with CSS classnames.
 *
 * @noInheritDoc
 * @element cwc-icon
 * @attr size - Apply numerical width-height or a t-shirt-sized CSS classname
 * @attr dir - Rotate icon 90° with the top of the icon pointing in the specified direction.
 * @attr flip - Reverse the orientation of the icon vertically or horizontally.
 * @cssprop --clr-icon-color-default
 * @cssprop --clr-icon-color-success
 * @cssprop --clr-icon-color-danger
 * @cssprop --clr-icon-color-warning
 * @cssprop --clr-icon-color-error
 * @cssprop --clr-icon-color-info
 * @cssprop --clr-icon-color-inverse
 * @cssprop --clr-icon-color-highlight
 */

attributes.name: shape
attributes.description:
Changes the svg glyph displayed in the icon component. Defaults to the 'unknown' icon if
the specified icon cannot be found in the icon registry.
attributes.jsDoc:
/**
   * Changes the svg glyph displayed in the icon component. Defaults to the 'unknown' icon if
   * the specified icon cannot be found in the icon registry.
   */

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Apply numerical width-height or a t-shirt-sized CSS classname

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: If present, customizes the aria-label for the icon for accessibility.
attributes.jsDoc: /** If present, customizes the aria-label for the icon for accessibility. */

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: If present, determines the id of the icon. Uses a generated unique id otherwise.
attributes.jsDoc: /** If present, determines the id of the icon. Uses a generated unique id otherwise. */

attributes.name: dir
attributes.description: Rotate icon 90° with the top of the icon pointing in the specified direction.

attributes.name: flip
attributes.description: Reverse the orientation of the icon vertically or horizontally.

properties.name: shape
properties.description:
Changes the svg glyph displayed in the icon component. Defaults to the 'unknown' icon if
the specified icon cannot be found in the icon registry.
properties.jsDoc:
/**
   * Changes the svg glyph displayed in the icon component. Defaults to the 'unknown' icon if
   * the specified icon cannot be found in the icon registry.
